image.alt: Smiling team and patients at Fantastic Smiles

paragraphs.text: We are a doctor-owned orthodontics practice trusted by thousands of families across Wyomissing, Douglassville, Pottstown and greater Berks County, Pennsylvania. Our team treats every patient like family, combining proven clinical care with a warm, personal approach.

We make treatment affordable with interest-free payment plans and flexible financing, and we believe a fantastic smile builds confidence and can change a life. From the first consultation to long-term retainers, we’re proud to be part of your smile journey.

items.title: Fantastic People
items.text: Meet the team that delivers thoughtful, patient-first care at every visit.

items.title: Fantastic Service
items.text: Free consultations, smile simulation tools, and affordable payment plans make care easy to start.

items.title: Fantastic Reputation
items.text: Voted #1 across the region, we’ve earned community trust through consistent results and care.

paragraphs.text: Dr. Natalie Parisi, DMD, is an accomplished clinician and adjunct professor of Orthodontics at Temple University. A published author and international speaker, she brings advanced training and deep community involvement to Fantastic Smiles, where she focuses on transforming smiles and mentoring the next generation of clinicians.

Dr. Dennis Mauro, DDS, is a practiced orthodontist known for a friendly, precise approach and excellent outcomes. He earned his dental degree at the University of Pittsburgh School of Dental Medicine and completed specialty training in orthodontics at Jacksonville University, bringing years of private-practice experience to our team.

Dr. Ashima Sharma, DDS, earned her dental and orthodontic degrees from Temple University and was recognized with the William S. Kramer Excellence Award for her dedication to the field. She focuses on precise, comfortable care and delivering esthetic results that help patients feel confident.
We offer discreet clear aligners, aesthetic clear braces, modern metal and ceramic systems, and a strong retainer program to keep your finished smile looking great.

image.alt: Patients and team ready to welcome you at Fantastic Smiles

seo.page_description: Fantastic Smiles in Berks County, PA offers Invisalign, clear braces, traditional braces and a strong retainer program. Call 610-374-4097 or book online for a $

og_meta.title: Fantastic Smiles — Wyomissing Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Fantastic Smiles provides family-focused orthodontic care in Wyomissing, Douglassville and Pottstown. Free consultations and flexible payment plans.

image.alt: ROG Orthodontics team in the office

paragraphs.text: At ROG Orthodontics, our practice philosophy is simple – To create the best possible orthodontic outcome for each of our patients. We treat our patients as we would our own families.

Every new patient who walks into our office has the opportunity to sit down face to face with one of our doctors. We take the necessary time with each of our patients to get a deeper understanding of their unique needs before designing their customized treatment plan.
We not only want to provide each patient with a Fantastic Smile that will last a lifetime, but create a Fantastic experience while doing so.

Dr. Nat is not only an accomplished clinician, but also a respected leader in her field. She serves as an adjunct professor of Orthodontics at Temple University, is a published author, and has spoken internationally on topics in orthodontics. Recognized by her peers as an expert in the profession, we’re incredibly lucky that she chooses to spend most of her time here at ROG Orthodontics.

Born and raised in Wyomissing, Dr. Parisi earned her undergraduate degree from Villanova University, graduated from the University of Maryland School of Dentistry, and completed her specialty orthodontic training at the Eastman Institute for Oral Health in Orthodontics.

Outside the office, she’s a proud Villanova basketball fan and enjoys golfing, traveling, working out, and spending time with family. She and her husband, Dr. Tom Bell, share two labs, Stanford and Roux.

image.alt: Dr. Parisi enjoying time with family

paragraphs.text: Dr. Ashima brings precision and compassion to every patient she treats. She approaches each case with careful planning and a focus on helping patients build lasting confidence through their smiles.

Dr. Ashima completed her undergraduate studies at Rutgers University and earned both her dental and orthodontic degrees from Temple University, where she graduated at the top of her class. She was recognized with the William S. Kramer Excellence Award in 2019.
Outside the practice Dr. Ashima enjoys cooking, arts and crafts, and traveling with her husband, who is also a dentist. She loves exploring new food scenes and is a fan of Formula 1 racing.

Dr. Mauro brings years of experience and a steady commitment to clinical excellence. After undergraduate studies at Penn State he earned his dental degree from the University of Pittsburgh School of Dental Medicine and completed his orthodontic specialty certification at Jacksonville University. He has provided outstanding care in private practice and is a trusted member of the ROG team.

Dr. Mauro completed his undergraduate studies at Penn State, earned his dental degree at the University of Pittsburgh School of Dental Medicine, and completed his orthodontic certification at Jacksonville University.

Originally from Oakmont, PA, Dr. Mauro enjoys family life with his wife Erin and their three teenage daughters. He values time spent at athletic events and family activities, and his friendly, approachable manner helps patients feel comfortable throughout treatment.

slides.alt: Clinical equipment and patient care area
Wyomissing office exterior at 840 Penn Avenue

paragraphs.text: Supporting the communities in which we practice is as important to us as creating Fantastic Smiles for our patients. From county schools to local charities and everything in between, we not only want to put smiles on the faces of our patients, we want to put smiles on all those around us. ROG consistently dedicates time and resources to support local organizations that impact children and their futures.

For over 60 years, the doctors and team at ROG have committed to changing lives in our community ONE FANTASTIC SMILE AT A TIME. ROG provides life changing FREE braces to deserving, underserved children through our Project Fantastic Smiles program. Download the application: https://fantasticsmiles.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Project-Fantastic-Smiles-Application.pdf

image.alt: Graphic representing community support by Lakeshore Orthodontics

Get Started.title: What to expect at your first visit

paragraphs.text: Your complimentary initial consultation gives you the chance to meet our doctors and team, learn about orthodontic options, receive a complete exam including X-rays, and discuss which treatments will best meet your needs. We will review your dental and medical history and begin creating a customized plan tailored to your smile goals.

At your first appointment we’ll explain recommended next steps, review insurance and interest-free financing options, and answer any questions you have. Please bring a photo ID, your insurance information, and any recent dental records or X-rays if available.

image.alt: Father with daughter at reception of dental office

paragraphs.text: We accept most major insurance plans and will file your claims electronically for your convenience.
Interest-free financing options are available to help make care affordable. Our team will work with you to create a payment plan that fits your budget. Your initial consultation is complimentary.

image.alt: Patients and team ready to welcome you at Fantastic Smiles

seo.page_description: Start your care at Fantastic Smiles. Learn what to expect at your first visit, access forms, and schedule your complimentary consultation.
seo.page_keywords: orthodontics, new patient, financing, Fantastic Smiles

og_meta.title: Get Started | Fantastic Smiles
og_meta.description: Start your care at Fantastic Smiles. Learn what to expect at your first visit, access forms, and schedule your complimentary consultation.

image.alt: Patients smiling in a bright orthodontic office

paragraphs.text: Metal braces remain a reliable, effective choice for many smiles. Today’s brackets are smaller and more comfortable, allowing precise tooth movement for a wide range of cases.
Damon® braces use a self-ligating system designed to reduce friction and often shorten treatment time. They can be an excellent option when efficiency and comfort matter.

image.alt: Two stylish teens smiling with braces

paragraphs.text: Damon® Clear offers a more discreet aesthetic by blending with tooth color. Its clear slide mechanism helps keep the braces looking clean while delivering predictable results.
Insignia™ combines a 3D scan and custom-engineered brackets and wires to deliver a treatment plan tailored to your bite. The result is precision fit and efficient tooth movement.

image.alt: Custom orthodontic treatment planning and fabrication

paragraphs.text: Incognito braces are placed behind the teeth, keeping your treatment invisible from the front. They are fully customized so you can achieve excellent results without visible brackets.

image.alt: Incognito lingual braces hidden behind teeth

paragraphs.text: Spark clear aligners offer an aesthetic, removable option for many adults and teens. Fantastic Smiles is proud to provide Spark as part of our clear aligner options.
Clear aligners use advanced 3D imaging to create removable, discreet trays that move teeth in stages. They let you brush, floss, and eat without bracket restrictions.
Retainers protect your investment. We offer custom removable and fixed options and will recommend a retention plan to keep your smile stable for the long term.

image.alt: Patients and team ready to welcome you at Fantastic Smiles

paragraphs.text: Find answers to common questions about our treatments, insurance, appointments, and aftercare. If you don’t see your question, call 610-374-4097, email braces@fantasticsmiles.com, or visit https://fantasticsmiles.com/contact-us/.

accordion.header: What orthodontic treatments do you offer?

paragraphs.text: We offer traditional metal and ceramic braces, clear Invisalign<sup>®</sup> aligners for a low-profile option, and custom retainers to protect your finished smile. Your treatment plan will be tailored to your needs and lifestyle.

image.alt: Happy family portrait in a dental office

accordion.header: At what age should my child see an orthodontist?

paragraphs.text: We follow the American Association of Orthodontists guidance and recommend an initial evaluation by age 7. Early visits let us monitor growth and plan any needed intervention before problems become more complex.

image.alt: Parents discussing care in a bright office

accordion.header: How long does treatment usually take?

paragraphs.text: Treatment length depends on the case, but many patients finish within 12 to 24 months. At your first visit we’ll review diagnostics and provide a personalized timeline and milestones.

accordion.header: What payment and insurance options are available?

paragraphs.text: We accept most major dental insurance plans and offer flexible monthly payment options to fit family budgets. Our team will help you estimate coverage and set up a payment plan if needed.

image.alt: Office staff assisting a patient at the front desk

accordion.header: How can I schedule an appointment?

paragraphs.text: Scheduling is easy. Call us at 610-374-4097, email braces@fantasticsmiles.com, or request an appointment online at https://fantasticsmiles.com/contact-us/. If you have a quick question, email or phone works best.

image.alt: Mother and daughter smiling together in a reception area
Patients and team ready to welcome you at Fantastic Smiles
